title: Things to do in Amsterdam: Museums
description: Your ultimate digital guide to Amsterdam Museums! If you go to Amsterdam and want to pay a visit to its many interesting museums, then this is your guide. 'Things To Do in Amsterdam: Museums' comprises four museumguides in total: The New Rijksmuseum (104 pp), the Van Gogh Museum (51 pp), the Anne Frank House (12 pp) and the Hermitage Museum Amsterdam (16 pp). All of them written by an expert in the field and without using art historical jargon. Download before your visit and you will more fully understand and enjoy what you are about to see!  >> Click NOW and save 50%!! <<
author: Marko Kassenaar
